channel.title: ByteByteGo Newsletter
channel.description: Explain complex systems with simple terms, from the authors of the best-selling system design book series. Join over 1,000,000 friendly readers.

item.title: 【Top Scalability Strategies for Real-World Load】Top Scalability Strategies for Real-World Load
item.description: 【In modern distributed systems, scalability is not a nice-to-have. Whether serving a global user base or responding to a viral spike, systems that fail to scale often fail outright.】In modern distributed systems, scalability is not a nice-to-have. Whether serving a global user base or responding to a viral spike, systems that fail to scale often fail outright.

item.title: 【EP176: How Does SSO Work?】EP176: How Does SSO Work?
item.description: 【Single Sign-On (SSO) is an authentication scheme. It allows a user to log in to different systems using a single ID.】Single Sign-On (SSO) is an authentication scheme. It allows a user to log in to different systems using a single ID.

item.title: 【EP175: What is the SOLID Principle?】EP175: What is the SOLID Principle?
item.description: 【SOLID offers guidelines to create software that is easy to understand, modify, and extend.】SOLID offers guidelines to create software that is easy to understand, modify, and extend.

item.title: 【How LLMs See Images, Audio, and More】How LLMs See Images, Audio, and More
item.description: 【Just like how "Hello world!" becomes discrete tokens for text processing, a photograph gets chopped into image patches, and a song becomes a sequence of audio codes.】Just like how "Hello world!" becomes discrete tokens for text processing, a photograph gets chopped into image patches, and a song becomes a sequence of audio codes.

item.title: 【How Atlassian Migrated 4 Million Jira Databases to AWS Aurora】How Atlassian Migrated 4 Million Jira Databases to AWS Aurora
item.description: 【Atlassian routinely migrates about 1,000 databases every day as part of its regular operations, and its users never notice.】Atlassian routinely migrates about 1,000 databases every day as part of its regular operations, and its users never notice.

item.title: 【A Guide to Top Caching Strategies】A Guide to Top Caching Strategies
item.description: 【In this article, we will explore the critical caching strategies that enable fast, reliable systems.】In this article, we will explore the critical caching strategies that enable fast, reliable systems.

item.title: 【EP174: 16 Coding Patterns That Make Interviews Easy】EP174: 16 Coding Patterns That Make Interviews Easy
item.description: 【Which other coding pattern will you add to the list?】Which other coding pattern will you add to the list?

item.title: 【How Uber Eats Deduplicates Hundreds of Millions of Product Images】How Uber Eats Deduplicates Hundreds of Millions of Product Images
item.description: 【At the scale of Uber Eats, image handling is an operational necessity. The platform manages hundreds of millions of product images, with millions of updates flowing through the system every hour.】At the scale of Uber Eats, image handling is an operational necessity. The platform manages hundreds of millions of product images, with millions of updates flowing through the system every hour.

item.title: 【How Reddit Delivers Notifications to Tens of Millions of Users】How Reddit Delivers Notifications to Tens of Millions of Users
item.description: 【Push notifications carry a double-edged sword in the design of any product. Done well, these notifications reconnect users with content they care about.】Push notifications carry a double-edged sword in the design of any product. Done well, these notifications reconnect users with content they care about.

item.title: 【How LLMs See the World】How LLMs See the World
item.description: 【Tokens are what rule the world of LLMs. You send tokens to models, you pay by the token, and models read, understand, and breathe tokens.】Tokens are what rule the world of LLMs. You send tokens to models, you pay by the token, and models read, understand, and breathe tokens.
